show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Today’s program-  Building a People’s News Media in the 21st Century.  We’ll talk about corporate media hegemony, top... <!--more--> down managed news propaganda, and grassroots resistance with Prof.
Robert Hackett of Simon Fraser University and Tracy Rosenberg of Media Alliance for most of the show today.
  Near the end of the hour we’ll check in with Sunsara Taylor who is on the streets in Washington, DC, participating in events marking the 40th anniversary of Roe v.
Wade and talk to her about media framing and propaganda of the patriarchy 40 years on…
